property.value: Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally, or 6 if you completed a quest this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage when a weapon, add a purity counter. You hero has Mend 1 for each purity counter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust seven cards you control to complete this quest. Reward: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This turn, target non-hero card can't be destroyed, and if it's an ally, prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight, Paladin, Rogue, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opponent's hero is dealt combat damage with this weapon, exhaust all cards he controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Argent Crusade Reputation This ally has Mend 1 for each Unique ally you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mend 1 When this ally heals damage from a hero or ally, that character as Assault 1 this turn.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Mage, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn: 2, Exhaust your hero --> Your hero deals fire damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of different classes among heroes and allies you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Holy Hero Required You pay 1 less to play Spirit of Redemption for each damage on your hero. Spirit of Redemption can't be destroyed while you control an ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip Kavi'je, discard a Shaman --> You pay 2 less to play your next totem this turn.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust your hero, discard a card --> Ready or exhaust target card if it shares a type with the card you discarded.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this item enters play, remove target ally from the game. If you do, add three marble counters, and that ally's owner puts it into play under his control when this item leaves play. At the start of your turn, remove a marble counter. If none remain, destroy this item.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target opposing ability, ally, or equipment. Ongoing: Attached card can't ready during it's controller's ready step. On your turn: 2 --> Attach this ability to target opposing ability, ally, or equipment.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Shaman, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: This turn, weapons you control have Assault 1 for each Shaman and Warrior you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This ally has Mend 3 while an ally is in your graveyard.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight, Paladin, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this armor prevents damage that would be dealt by an attacker, your hero deals that much unpreventable holy damage to that attacker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector Once per turn: 1 --> Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn: Flip Andora, discard a Rogue --> When target ally is dealt damage this turn, destroy it.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deal 2 melee damage to target hero or ally. Weapons you control have Assault 2 this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero heals 3 damage from target ally. You may ready that ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blood Elf Hero Required You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you place a resource face up, your hero may deal 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to a second target hero or ally this turn. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gnome Hero Required You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you place a resource face up, you may ready an equipment you control. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orc Hero Required You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you play a resource face up, your hero has Assault 2 this turn. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight, Paladin, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: This weapon enters play with a +1 ATK counter for each card in your hand. Remove a +1 ATK counter --> Exhaust target ally.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Mage, Priest, Warlock

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an ally you control would be dealt damage, 1 of it is dealt to your hero instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip Thaka, discard a Hunter --> Ready up to two resources you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Argent Crusade Reputation For each Unique ally you control, you may pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card for each 2 paid this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Paladin, Priest, Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Exhaust your hero --> Reveal a random card from your hand. If it's a [Holy] card, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally and heals 2 damage from itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this ally enters play, he may deal 4 melee damage to target ally with a cost or 4 less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This ally has Mend 2 while she's damaged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn: Flip Tysandri, discard a Rogue --> Tysandri deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Holy Hero Required Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Hunter, Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player can't ready more than three resources during his ready step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this ally is dealt damage, target opponent reveals his hand. Death Rattle: You may choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment." If you do, target opponent reveals his hand, and this ally deals 1 melee damage to his hero for each revealed card of that kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Argent Crusade Reputation Protector This ally has +1 / +1 for each other Unique ally you control

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each opposing ally that left play this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Opposing Ongoing abilities lose and can't have powers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust four cards you control to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn. Ongoing: Attached character has -4 ATK.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight, Hunter, Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with this weapon while your hero is defending, it hels 4 damage from itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arms Hero Required Interrupt target equipment. If you do, put three 0 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Warrior ally tokens into play with Assault 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This ally has Stealth while an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assault 1 When this ally exhausts for the first time ach turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready her.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Crafted 1/3

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, [Exhaust] Turn a resource you control face down --> Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Crafted 2/3

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this armor prevents damage that would be dealt by an attacking ally, that ally can't ready while this armor remains in your control.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Crafted 3/3

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tailoring Hero Required You can control any number of locations. When you place a resource face up, you may ready all locations you control. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
